statement: An enthusiastic, determined and experienced product developer
blurb: Josh has 10 years of experience working in product development in a variety of industries. He provides a fresh approach to problem solving, generate and communicate ideas impressively. From building an initial proof of concept, he can take the idea forward into a fully productionised system, adding value and delighting clients. As a senior frontend developer with experience in the full stack, Josh fits into agile development teams with ease, with a strong integration and DevOps mindseet.
